title: Life in China: mill worker's family
creator_credit: Richard Sanderson and Department of Photography and Cinema, Ohio State University
brief_description: One of a series of films about contemporary life in Mainland China. Reveals the family life of a skilled cotton-mill worker, his wife, son and grandmother. The family is seen at work, at home, at study and enjoying leisure as a three generation family on their duty off in Peking’s Park.
